p: The AR is expressed at similar levels in male and female mouse with no detectable modulation over time ( 38). In human, AR is expressed in fetal lungs as soon as 13–16 weeks of pregnancy, mainly in epithelial cells ( 41) and fibroblasts ( 42) to a lesser extent. It is detected in the cytoplasm and nucleus of the conducting and respiratory zone cells ( 37). AR mRNA levels increases between the saccular and alveolar stage of lung development as opposed to 17β-HSD type 2 which decreases ( 40). These results suggest that the androgen sensibility in the lung begin before the alveolar stage. AR is detected in 17β-HSD type 5 positive and negative cells such as fibroblasts.
